org.glowa.danube.components.actor.tourism.utilities
Class FormatedFileReaderWS

java.lang.Object
  org.glowa.danube.components.actor.tourism.utilities.FormatedFileReaderWS

public class FormatedFileReaderWS
extends java.lang.Object

Read and parse a ASCII-File.

This class provides functions to read integer, float, double and strings values. The FormatedFileReader uses internal a fast buffering schema and a java.io.FileInputStream for reading the file.

The FormatedFileReader does NOT extend the FileInputStream since the local buffering schema may break some member functions of the FileInputStream.

All Exceptions generated by the FileInputStream are passed forward by the FormatedFileReader.

Version:
1.0 16.09.2002
Author:
Roland Barthel

                     throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                            java.io.IOException

public boolean eofReached()
check if the end of file is reached. Warning: EOF is signaled after the first EOF-Exception occured.

Returns:
true if EOF is reached else false.

readWord

public java.lang.String readWord()
                          throws java.io.IOException
read the next word in the file. A word is a sequence of none white space chars. A Blank, tab, carrage return and the newline char is considered as a white space char. leading white spache chars are skiped.

Returns:
a String containing the word.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

readInt

public int readInt()
            throws java.lang.NumberFormatException,
                   java.io.IOException,
                   java.io.EOFException
read an integer value. A sequence of digits which is seperated by white space is expected. Leading white space is skipped. A NumberFormat Exception is thrown if no integer is found.

Returns:
integer value found in the file.
Throws:
java.lang.NumberFormatException
java.io.IOException
java.io.EOFException

readDouble

public double readDouble()
                  throws java.lang.NumberFormatException,
                         java.io.IOException
read a double value. A valid double number which is seperated by white space is expected. Leading white space is skipped. A NumberFormat Exception is thrown if no double is found.

Returns:
double value found in the file.
Throws:
java.lang.NumberFormatException
java.io.IOException

                throws java.lang.NumberFormatException,
                       java.io.IOException
read a float value. A valid float number which is seperated by white space is expected. Leading white space is skipped. A NumberFormat Exception is thrown if no float is found.

float value found in the file.
Throws:
java.lang.NumberFormatException

readLine

public java.lang.String readLine()
                          throws java.io.IOException
read a whole line of the file. The line ends at the next linefeed found in the file.

Returns:
the line as a string value
Throws:
java.io.IOException

                    throws java.io.IOException

java.io.IOException

close

public void close()
close the file.

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] argv)
main method allows us to run as a standalone demo. A text file called "text.txt.in" is written and then read.

getChar

private final char getChar()
                    throws java.io.EOFException,
                           java.io.IOException
get one char of the file. This function is the only function that actually reads the file. The file is read in large chunks which are internally buffered to get a better I/O performance. if EOF is reached a EOFException is thrown.

Returns:
the next char in the file.
Throws:
java.io.EOFException
java.io.IOException
